description:
Online and Virtual Meetings Available

Legal transactions are often confusing and complex. At the law firm of Barrows Levy PLLC, our team strives to combine personalized and cost-efficient services to help clients meet their goals, needs and expectations in the most effective manner possible.The law firm of Barrows Levy PLLC, is located at several convenient locations in Melville, Westbury and two locations in New York City. Barrows Levy PLLC offers a wide array of legal services such as representation of Real Estate Transactions, Estate Planning, Divorce, Family Law, Personal Injury, Workers' Compensation, Corporate Law, Mergers and Acquisition, Probate and Estate Administration, Estate Litigation, and all types of Litigation.

Our law firm serves a range of clients, including individuals, closely held corporations, family businesses, international clients, people that have been injured by an accident or on the job, and people in need of legal assistance. Our practice areas are as diverse as our clients and include business law, banking and finance, family law, divorce, estate planning, real estate transactions and real estate law, personal injury, workers' compensation and litigation. We feel confident handling a range of legal matters that fall within these areas of practice:

Real Estate
Estate Planning - Wills and Trusts
Divorce
Personal Injury
Workers' Compensation
Mergers and acquisitions
Business structures
Family Law
Probate and Estate administration
Litigation


A large part of our practice also involves helping injured parties recover damages for their injuries. We aggressively pursue the maximum amount of compensation for individuals who sustained injuries on the job or as a result of car or truck accidents, premises liability, medical malpractice or assault and battery. In addition to guiding clients through the workers' compensation and personal injury processes, we are prepared to help grieving survivors pursue wrongful death suits.

The law firm of Barrows Levy PLLC, truly cares about its clients and tirelessly pursues the best possible outcome for all cases. We offer free initial consultations and accept credit cards.a
